events.name: Unified Filmmakers Festival
events.description: UNIFIED FILMMAKERS FESTIVAL are looking for stories about experiences during and after the crisis.  Stories about magical moments on balconies and the nightmare of being locked in; about new-found closeness and oppressive confinement; about a change of attitude sparking new hopes as well as fears

events.name: Stockholm Independent Film Festival
events.description: Official Selection: Films selected for screening will be notified via email. If you received a Nomination email, but no Official Selection email, it means your film will not be screened, but is still a contender for an award in its category.

events.name: New York Indian Film Festival
events.description: The New York Indian Film Festival is North America's oldest and most prestigious film festival which features cinema from India, and the Indian Diaspora.

events.name: Waterfront Festival of International Films Lavasa
events.description: Waterfront Festival of International Films Lavasa will strive for a world in which enlightenment, knowledge and tolerance prevail.

events.name: CMS VATAVARAN
events.description: CMS VATAVARAN is a pioneer in international film festival and forum on environment and wildlife in India. Using films as a window to delve into nature, the festival showcases the best of Indian and International films and documentaries.
